data.question: What is the yield of FIR-6 based on H3L?
What is the difference in yield between FIR-6 and FIR-7 based on H3L?
data.answer: FIR-6 has a yield of 70% while FIR-7 has a yield of 65% based on H3L.

data.question: Is the space group of FIR-6 the same as FIR-7?
What is the Langmuir surface area of FIR-7?
Does the synthesis of FIR-7 involve the use of bpp?
What is the maximum emission peak shift observed between FIR-6 and the H3L ligand?
data.answer: A slight blue-shift of 20 nm occurs in the maximum emission peaks in FIR-6 compared to the H3L ligand.

data.question: What is the selectivity of C3H8/CH4 for FIR-7a-ht at 298 K?
Is the C3H8 uptake capacity of FIR-7a-ht at 298 K and 1 atm higher than that of MnMOF-74?
What is the role of DMPU in the synthesis of FIR-6?
data.answer: DMPU acts as a solvent and also becomes a dangling ligand binding to one Zn center, controlling the dimensionality of the framework.

data.question: What is the effective window size of the 1D hexagonal channel in FIR-7?
Does FIR-7 exhibit a higher C2H6/CH4 separation selectivity than ZIF-8?
What is the structural difference between FIR-6 and FIR-7?
data.answer: FIR-6 presents a 2D motif with kgd topology, while FIR-7 is a pillared-layer framework with a novel (3,8)-connected topology.

data.question: What is the heating rate used in thermal stability studies?
Is the synthesis of both FIR-6 and FIR-7 carried out at the same temperature?
What is the impact of the bpp ligand on the structure of FIR-7 compared to FIR-6?
data.answer: The presence of the bpp ligand in FIR-7 leads to the formation of a pillared-layer framework, unlike the 2D motif in FIR-6.

data.question: What is the void volume of FIR-7 without guest molecules?
Does FIR-7a-ht have a reversible type-I sorption behaviour for N2?
What is the role of the trinuclear [Zn3(COO)6] unit in the structure of FIR-7?
data.answer: The trinuclear [Zn3(COO)6] unit in FIR-7 is connected by L ligands to form a double-layer structure, which is further linked by bpp ligands to form a pillared-layer framework.

data.question: What is the maximum uptake of C2H6 by FIR-7a-ht at 273 K?
Is the synthesis of FIR-6 and FIR-7 performed under autogenous pressure?
